PUNKS Comic.name: PUNKS Comic
PUNKS Comic.description:
Description
What is PUNKS Comic?
EVERY PUNK HAS A STORY!
OWN CHARACTERS FROM ONE OF THE MOST GROUNDBREAKING PROJECTS IN THE NFT SPACE: WELCOME TO NFi (NFT + DeFi)

Refinable.name: Refinable
Refinable.description:
Description
What is Refinable?
Refinable is the definitive solution to create, discover, trade, and leverage NFTs. Our marketplace provides an accessible environment, for any user, brand, or community, by offering multi-chain flexibility, ultra-low cost alternatives, and high performance options to engage with NFT content.

Shark Outlaw Squad.name: Shark Outlaw Squad
Shark Outlaw Squad.description:
Description
What is Shark Outlaw Squad?
Shark Outlaw Squad (SOS) is a collection of 7,777 crime themed shark NFT featuring two opposing squads: Justice and Outlaw that will clash on D-Day of the biggest squad war in the town.
This squad war centers around a mysterious Vault in the Shark Central Bank. Team Justice is the law and order equivalent of these sharks who patrol the city and uphold rules, including the no-entry edict on The Vault. But Team Outlaw, a group of rebels and outcasts, have their eyes on the ultimate raid to pillage what’s hidden in The Vault. With an all-out weapon warfare, these sharks are ready to rain dust and gunpowder in the city.

Sidus NFT Heroes.name: Sidus NFT Heroes
Sidus NFT Heroes.description:
Description
What is Sidus NFT Heroes?
SIDUS: NFT Heroes is a collection of 6,000 generative characters created by NFT STARS and the international collective of modern artists NFT256. The collection features 4,000 Original NFT Heroes, 1,000 Rare Heroes, 500 Legendary Heroes and 500 Partnership NFT Heroes. Only the original 4,000 are available for purchase, the rest are created using upgrade cards and the Galaxy Modificator. According to the lore, every Hero came to the independent city of SIDUS from one of 12 blockchain planets (Bitcoione, Avalanya, Polygopus, Tronguan, etc.). Each Hero’s home planet has left an imprint on their appearance, character and armor. In the future, the SIDUS collection will transform into a gaming metaverse where every sidus hero is a giving an access to a game. Sidus is not just a game but an amazing journey with limitless opportunities!

Spunks.name: Spunks
Spunks.description:
Description
What is Spunks?
Spunks were created by visual & generative artist @Spongenuity. With the help of @0x_b1, this is one of the first projects to ever create new art out of a burning. And the first NFT ever to perform a cross-chain vampire attack. There is a max supply of 10,000 Spunks and no more will ever exist.

Substrata.name: Substrata
Substrata.description:
Description
What is Substrata?
Substrata is a multi-user cyberspace/metaverse. Chat with other users or explore objects and places that other users have created.
You can create a free user account and add objects to the world as well!
Land parcels in Substrata are for sale, and can be minted as Ethereum NFTs.
Substrata is early in development, please expect rough edges!

The Evolving Forest.name: The Evolving Forest
The Evolving Forest.description:
Description
What is The Evolving Forest?
This collection represents 9,336 Sacred Genesis saplings. The seeds will reveal once the public sale has concluded.
A sacred transplating ceremony will be held on 15th October, and the seeds will transform into beautiful unique saplings with different traits and rarities.
Beware of scam collections and join us on Discord!

The WynLambo.name: The WynLambo
The WynLambo.description:
Description
What is The WynLambo?
The WynLambo are a cute but terrifying new collection of  9,999 full 3D NFTs.The WynLambo are the nemesis of the VOIDs. Upon release, for every 3 VOIDs in a wallet, that wallet will be eligible to redeem 1 WynLambo.

TiKi Bar.name: TiKi Bar
TiKi Bar.description:
Description
What is TiKi Bar?
Imagine Tiki Bar as a (very party focused) College.
Each PFP community is a Fraternity or Sorority.
One BIG Tiki Bar Nation having a fun competition.
BUT... The stakes are high. You want your PFP community to win!
Because it can make YOU more money from licensing your PFP artwork.

Token Multisender.name: Token Multisender
Token Multisender.description:
Description
What is Token Multisender?
If you want to save some time on sending multiple token transfers, you can use multisender. It can generate transactions using metamask in trust-less way by using only javascript and smart contract. Mostly used by crypto funds, airdroppers where you can submit a list of addresses with balances in CSV format. It has processed ~9k transactions on mainnet.

Two Bit Bears.name: Two Bit Bears
Two Bit Bears.description:
Description
What is Two Bit Bears?
Bear Details
The Fur
Fur colors are pulled from an RGB spectrum—ensuring all bears have a unique visual fingerprint. Twins are possible, but unlikely.
The Names
Unique bears deserve unique names. Randomized names are given to each bear on mint—named after those who have inspired our adventure.
The Moods
We didn't stop at hyperrealistic—these bears have feelings. Each has one of four ingrained mood types that will play a part during mating season...
Two Pixels
Each bear is literally comprised of two pixels. More specifically, an SVG graphic with limitless scalability. (Bears scale automatically on OpenSea, etc.)

Video Game Dev Squad.name: Video Game Dev Squad
Video Game Dev Squad.description:
Description
What is Video Game Dev Squad?
When You Buy 1 of our 5,555 hand drawn, randomly assembled, 1 of 1 Avatars, you will be joining the VIDEO GAME DEV SQUAD, a Community of both Experts & Fans that have teamed up to Build a PLAY2EARN Blockchain Game Together! Grab your AVATAR and Help Up Build a FREAKIN VIDEO GAME!

Animal Society V2.name: Animal Society V2
Animal Society V2.description:
Description
What is Animal Society V2?
End the Jpeg Animal NFT Civil War, Unite All Jpeg Animals in one NFT Society.

Animoca Brands Launchpad.name: Animoca Brands Launchpad
Animoca Brands Launchpad.description:
Description
What is Animoca Brands Launchpad?
The Animoca Brands Launchpad is a token presale platform for new projects looking to enter the expansive, and ever changing blockchain metaverse.
Animoca Brands Launchpad sale events, issue Token Vouchers, which carry a token value of the sale token, which can be redeemed at a later date. But as the Token Vouchers are NFTs, they can be freely traded across marketplaces.

AnRKey X.name: AnRKey X
AnRKey X.description:
Description
What is AnRKey X?
AnRKey X™ combines DeFi and eSports gaming for users to compete, purchase and stake unique NFTs and win valuable rewards.
Founded by recognized global leaders in blockchain, crypto assets, and DeFi, the AnRKey X™ protocol platform is a gDEX (Decentralized Finance Gaming Platform Exchange), designed to merge DeFi, eSports, and Web 3.0 NFTs into one on their gaming platform creating a brand new industry called m$ports (money sports). AnRKey X’s token, $ANRX, works just like an arcade coin, the more you purchase, play, stake, sell, and compete, the more $ANRX you earn within the AnRKey X™ gaming system. The award winning team has over 60+ years of combined experience working in blockchain and crypto, traditional gaming, financial technology, and music and entertainment industries. The team is combining DeFi liquidity reward farming and staking with community driven eSports and Web 3.0 NFTs. The AnRKey X™ defi game and NFT studio will be releasing continuous games in their m$ports™ genre, with their first game Battle Wave 2323™

Blitmap.name: Blitmap
Blitmap.description:
Description
What is Blitmap?
It all started with some pixel art.
We called them Blitmaps. We made 100 originals, which the community mixed to make 1,600 siblings — unique pieces that combine the composition of one original with the palette of another.

Blockchain Cuties.name: Blockchain Cuties
Blockchain Cuties.description:
Description
What is Blockchain Cuties?
Cutest collectable game with adventures on Ethereum blockchain where you get to play with puppies, dragons, bear cubs, cats and other real and fantasy creatures alike!

BT.Finance.name: BT.Finance
BT.Finance.description:
Description
What is BT.Finance?
BT.Finance is a smart DeFi yield aggregator based on ethereum ecosystem, targets the best and sustainable yield for tokens.
The Vaults are divided into 3 pools as Stable Profits Pool, High Yield Pool and Smart Hybrid Pool to all users with various risk tolerances. The BT Vault v1 is to earn $CRV $SUSHI $PICKLE $BADGER $LDO $BAS $MIS $FXS from other excellent DeFi yield aggregators and platforms, thanks for their innovative products and hard work.
Security is our first priority,we will have insurance fund to buy insurance from Defi insurance platforms such as Nexus Mutual and Cover Protocol besides the peckshield security audit.
The project is launched by the community, It will run with Dao that is governed by vote of the community. We invite senior people in the blockchain industry and fund managers to serve as strategist and economic advisers to the development team.

Bumper.name: Bumper
Bumper.description:
Description
What is Bumper?
Bumper protects the value of your crypto using an innovative DeFi protocol. Set the price you want to protect at and if the market crashes, your asset will never fall below that price. Importantly, if the market pumps, your asset rises too.
Protect your crypto price from market drops
To protect your assets simply connect your wallet to the Bumper dApp. Choose the amount and price of the crypto asset you want to protect and it's locked in. No matter where the market heads, the value of your crypto won't drop below the set price.
Earn a regular yield by staking
Stake your stablecoin (USDC initially) and receive a yield arising from premiums paid by those taking protection and additional Bump tokens. Depositing earns you a 'Bumpered' fungible yield-bearing token which you can transact and trade, as you would any other token.

CellETF.name: CellETF
CellETF.description:
Description
What is CellETF?
CellETF is a decentralized encrypted asset investment fund on Ethereum. Based on a transparent and trustless decentralized fund protocol, it defines a new asset management paradigm in the DeFi field.
CellETF is committed to providing professional and reliable all-weather encrypted asset management services to users around the world. The strategy pool of the fund agreement will bring together high-quality assets and DeFi projects in the market. At the same time, CellETF will also deploy multi-chain funds for cross-chain asset management, requiring only one site , You can embrace the infinite possibilities of encrypted assets.
eCell is a governance token. The community jointly governs CellETF by means of proposals and voting. All expenses captured by decentralized funds will be used to repurchase and destroy eCell.

Cross Mint.name: Cross Mint

Crypto Volatility Index (CVI).name: Crypto Volatility Index (CVI)
Crypto Volatility Index (CVI).description:
Description
What is Crypto Volatility Index (CVI)?
CVI is a full-scale decentralized ecosystem that brings the sophisticated and very popular “market fear index” into the crypto market. 
Built on Ethereum and Polygon, it consists of an index that tracks the 30-day implied volatility of Bitcoin and Ethereum.
The index ranges between 0 and 200 and is produce based on a Black-Scholes option pricing model, which computes the implied volatility of cryptocurrency option prices together with analyzing the market’s expectation of future volatility.
The CVI brings a new set of tools to the DeFi space. Users can:  
Buy a position in the index if they believe volatility in crypto is about to grow, as a speculation or as a hedge for their portfolio.
Become a platform liquidity provider to earn fees whether they feel that volatility will decrease or remain the same.   
Protect their position as liquidity providers on DEXs against impermanent loss (caused by major fluctuations in assets price, regardless of the direction)   
Earn $GOVI, the DAO token of CVI, on all of the above.    
   CVI is an open-source code that allows further trading instruments to be built upon the CVI index by the crypto community.

CryptoHoots Steampunk Parliament.name: CryptoHoots Steampunk Parliament
CryptoHoots Steampunk Parliament.description:
Description
What is CryptoHoots Steampunk Parliament?
CryptoHoots are a rowdy crowd of steampunk owls who think the 20th century was a mistake. They live in an alternate timeline in the metaverse where gear-driven gadgets and steam-powered machinery rules the roost. They have no need for electricity. Their blockchain technology uses *actual* chains and blocks. These fascinating creatures must be studied! We need your help to catalog 2,500 Hoots from this timeline.

CryptoMutts.name: CryptoMutts
CryptoMutts.description:
Description
What is CryptoMutts?
CryptoMutts is a collection of 10,000 randomly generated NFT’s on the Ethereum blockchain. Adopting a CryptoMutt includes membership to the first NFT Arts Club. Members will receive early access to art content from the creator Kenny Schachter, including art market articles and future NFT airdrops exclusive to holders.
Owners receive 100 $NFTism token for each CryptoMutt they mint. Tokens can be traded on Uniswap in exchange for Ethereum. $NFTism is the official token of the NFT Arts Club and can be traded for perks such as merch and members-only NFT’s. $NFTism tokens can be claimed once minting has concluded.
